attributes.action: Ban all people who have signed the petition " http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/scrapcam/ to scrap speed cameras" from driving on British roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are against the petition http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/scrapcam

Everyone who signs the above petition clearly wishes to speed and has a total disregard for road safety and the law.

People like these should not be allowed to drive motor vehicles, often weighing many tons, on our roads.

It is time to remove the menace they cause, and reduce the 3600+ deaths they cause every year.
